structure.unit: ARTICLE LVIII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY AFFIRMATIVE ACTION ADVISORY BOARD

text.section:
Sec. 2-721. Created; terms; compensation.
There is hereby created a Miami-Dade County Affirmative Action Advisory Board consisting of thirteen (13) members, one member to be appointed by each County Commissioner. The terms of each member shall be coterminous with the term of the appointing Commissioner. In no event shall a Board member serve more than four (4) years. Members shall serve without compensation.
